PCIResourceInfo_t Struct Reference

#include <Ioctl.h>

ULONG numBARs

bool hasInterrupt
ULONG intrVector

Detailed Description

Device Drvier specific information to return to user space. This includes the BAR resources allocated to the device, interrupts, etc. NOTE: to keep backwards compatibility with older applications that were built against v1.0.0.x drivers, do no add any new fields to this structure or the driver will crash during copying info back to user pages because the size will be different and a fault will occur. Add new fields to the extra info struct.
